EmailTemplate.name: Export Reservables
EmailTemplate.subject: Reservables Details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
wework
Hi {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your interest in WeWork!
Please find all relevant pricing and availability in the table below
Office Details
*Membership requires a fully refundable service retainer and one time set-up fee
The above options include the following:
Fully furnished workspace Logo print on office door Paid tax + utilities 24/7 access to the building Conference rooms Login to the Member Network of 100,000+ WeWork members globally Access to WeWork buildings our other cities (New York, San Francisco, LA, Boston, DC, Chicago, London, Tel Aviv, Etc.) Invitations to all of our events and office hours Phone booths Fast and secure wifi + ethernet connection Printing and scanning Access to benefits and discounts from partner companies Business address+ mail and package handling Free coffee, tea and beer on tap
We'd love to have you stop in for a cup of coffee so you can check out what's happening in our community. Please respond to this email or call us directly at 1-877-594-7916 to arrange a visit.
Thanks, {!User.FirstName}
Copyright 2016 | WeWork
Terms | Privacy
